function.name: mongo_count
function.description: Counts the number of objects in collection that match query. If query is null or not specified it will count all objects in collection. If mongo is not provided the last active connection will be used.

example.description: Counting the amount of objects in the “furniture” collection:
Counting the amount of objects in the “furniture” collection with “height” >= 100.
